Name: Reactive Stance
Application: Action-application is changed to Reaction, with the Trigger of "An enemy combatant declares they're attacking you."

Name: Combustible
Application: The Use-cost of this Ability is now burnable (affix an exclamation mark to the AP cost). Reduce the Ability's Rank by 1 (min 1).
Ingredients: 1x Obsidian Chunk, 1x Fire Blob Core, 1x Gudon Liver

Name: Far Reaching
Application: Add 5fcs to the Use-cost of this Ability. Increase its Range by 1sp.

Name: Artillery
Application: Add (3/battle) to the Use-cost of this Ability. Increase its Range by 2sp.

Name: Miniature
Application: Reduce the Use-cost of this Ability by 50%. Reduce the Rank of this weapon by 50%.

Name: Hyperactive
Application: This Ability must be Passive and not have a listed Use-cost. The Ability is given a Use of 10AP. Increase the Ability's Effects by 50%, and the Effects last until the beginning of your next turn.

Name: Mind over Matter
Application: This Ability's listed Stamina cost is changed to Focus. The Ability's MleDmg is replaced with SklDmg.

Name: Naturalize.
Application: This Ability's listed damage element is changed to your own class's element. Add 2mna to the Use cost.

Name: Targeting System
Application: Change this Ability's Evade check to individually made Accuracy checks. Increase non-AP Use-costs by 50% (must have AP cost 5 or greater).

Name: Rifled Aim
Application: Remove this Ability's AoE attribute. Increase its range by 2sp.

Name: Overdrive
Application: Increase this Ability's uses-per-turn by 1. Reduce its Rank by 1 (min 0).

Name: Capsaicin Oil
Application: Replace this Ability's Burning status effect with Poison.

Name: Combative Stance
Application: This Reactive-application Ability is now Action-application; it no longer has a Trigger. Add 5AP+7sta to its Use-cost.

Name: Reduce Torque
Application: Reduce this Ability's Use-cost from 20 to 10. Double the Stamina, Mana, Focus cost (must affect at least one).

Name: Litter
Application: This Ability, which conjures a prop, changes its Use-cost to be "(1/turn)". It has 1 Health.

Name: Commonwealth
Application: This Ability, which targets an allie, instead targets all allies in the same space. Add 1{MlePwr} Health to its Use-cost.

Name: Burst Power
Application: Increase this Ability's Rank by 1. It can only be used once per battle.

Name: Shotgun
Application: Reduce the AoE range of this ability to 0sp. Increase its Rank by 2. Increase its AP cost by 10.

Name: Headshot
Application: If this Ability increases your Accuracy check(s) by any amount, it instead increases your Critical Threshold by half the amount.

Name: Helping Hand
Application: If this Ability would target the self, it instead targets an allie within the same space.

Name: Rush Defense
Application: If this Ability improves any of your Evasion scores, make its Use-cost burnable. Increase its AP cost by 10.

Name: Blood Offering
Application: Where in this ability it says "End your turn", replace with "Self-inflict (2){MlePwr} damage."
